title: Aga Naga Naga lyrics Ko Songs lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Vijay Prakash, Tipu, Ranina Reddy, Priya Subaramani, Solar Sai, Rap Emcee Jesz, Srik
Song: Aga Naga
Lyrics: Pa Vijay

Bonja, boys and girls
you people look so good tonight
lets party and heat this pa
As we take it higher
we gonna set the song on fire
And yeah sragugalin vanakam swagatha namaskaram vandhanam

Vinnilum mannilum ulla nakchathirangalodu
onna serndhu inaindhu pinaindhu ninaindhu
Pichi pinni perthedukalam, Yeah, Yeah

Aga Naga Naga siripugal azhaga
Thigu Thaga thaga nizhavugal alaga
Very very samathugal azhaga
Kolukolupukgal azhaga ...........(2)

Lambugini, Love-o-many, velli sani
Iravellam idhal pani
Nee pathini, theepathini, unmel ini
yaaradi theni

Thozh saaidhaal annaipu, AVan thozhan endra ninaipu
Yen indha padaipu, Ingu illai kalaipu -- (2)

Thaaka thaakave thudikudhe nenjam
Noka Nokave pudikudhe konjam

Thoda thoda rolex minna, thonna thonna virtue pesa
Jillu jillu saphain ponga, Swis keysai mella .. (2)
Brand-o-du vazhkai, Friend-o-du serkai
Kaiyodu yaar kai, ahhh nalla yaakai
Manam maarum fashion, marradhu passion
pagalelaam vesham, Ma-la-yil nesam,

Va kadhal ferrai,ila nenjai allum jonali
Louivicto kannadi, pala kangal pinnadi .. (2)

Yo Yo,
GOods your shoe go switch your standard
No Local only branded, Dhil irundh aaatam poda vaa
Mudiyaati kaiyakati paar, Thaaka thaakave thudikudhe nenjam
Yeah, fachionukillai rasion aanal
Kadavul thanda varam thaan passion now
Let me make my little confession love
has no brands on the .. right now
....
pudikudhe pudikudhe..
Nooru nooru per aruge aruge, yaar yaar sol azhage
ver ver oor maname maname, Verthidadha oru iname   (2)

Min minu pagal, min veechugal kottum
Silu silupaaga, sila silmisham sottum
Idhudhan idhudhan uilmai uzhgam
Vettri ondruthan ingae udhavum

Aga Naga Naga siripugal azhaga ...
Lambugini, Love-o-many, velli sani ..
Thozh saaidhaal annaipu
AVal thozhi endra ninaipu
Yen indha padaipu
Ingu illai kalaipu -- (2)
